name: TBWA Worldwide
overview: TBWA Worldwide Inc. offers advertising and brand marketing strategy services internationally. The company offers brand strategy development, account management and brand stewardship, advertising creative development, and connections planning that include holistic communications planning and integration; new product development, and regional and promotional advertising that include micro-marketing; and business to business communications, broadcast studio, and pre-press studio services. It also offers direct and relationship marketing strategy, interactive and digital strategy, and interactive and digital creative production services through its direct marketing and interactive agency. In addition, the company offers retail and shopper marketing, promotional marketing, field marketing, interactive marketing, and Web development, as well as emerging channels, which include digital indoor and outdoor displays, kiosks, iTV, and mobile phones; and planning and buying of interactive media, fame, a retail brand agency, consumer focused branding, retail strategy, in store merchandising and environmental, design, and promotion. Further, it offers building retail brands. The company is headquartered in New York, New York. TBWA Worldwide Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Omnicom Group Inc.

acquisitions.source_description: TBWA acquires Magnon, India's leading digital company
